products.name: Nikon
products.description: The Nikon Z 5 mirrorless camera is tough, light, easy to handle, and compatible with a wide array of full-frame lenses.

products.name: iPhone
products.description: The iPhone X has a 5.85 inch (marketed as 5.8 inch) OLED color-accurate screen that supports DCI-P3 wide color gamut, sRGB, and high dynamic range,and has a contrast ratio of 1,000,000:1.
